sun.jvm.hotspot.ui

Class SourceCodePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • sun.jvm.hotspot.ui.SourceCodePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SourceCodePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel supporting loading of and scrolling through source code. Contains convenience routines for implementing the Editor interface.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
